website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch orthopedic cat bed with form-fitting support. Memory foam construction effectively reduces joint pressure while cooling gel beads keep kitties from becoming uncomfortably hot.
pros: Shredded memory foam sleep surface distributes weight evenly and molds to your cat’s contours, helping to alleviate aches and pains
Cooling gel beads work to prevent excessive heat-retention
Snuggly-soft interior is bolstered for extra head and back support
cons: Cover zipper feels flimsy and can be a bit sticky

customer_reviews.title: What a deal, well made, doesn’t smell of chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Our “kids” love this bed. We originally didn’t think our guys liked beds until we stayed at an Inn overnight that supplied beds for the dogs. We were surprised when our guys hoped right in so we set out to find the same bed. Happily , this is way more affordable than manynout there from the catalog companies. The bolster surround is nice and acts as a nice head or chin rest. The firm center sections seem to provide nice support And have crevices for legs/feet/chin spots. The photos are of our Large size bed. The dogs are 23 and 16 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for curling up in!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves curling up in this bed and looks so cozy in it! The plush fabric is super soft and the memory foam is so supportive. Love that the cover can be removed and is machine washable, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rustalini

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! So much that I have three of them. Only problem is that the largest portion of the bed had what appears to be a fiber filling. The rest of the bed has encased filling. So when you go to wash the bed it becomes a project as you have to hand pick all of the stuffing out. Other than that- great product and my pups love it.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Not a size medium ...
customer_reviews.text: I already have a size medium bed that looks just like the photo shown. What I received was much smaller and I’m sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this did not hold up very long. My girl found a small piece of piping to play with and it went downhill from there. She pulled the front apart by the label and pulled out the stuffing. For $98 I hoped it would have lasted a while. Different names can be found in local retail stores for $30 cheaper. Would have given 1/2 star if allowed.
customer_reviews.author: lisa m.

customer_reviews.title: Not a memory foam bed
customer_reviews.text: Our 70+ lbs 7 month old bernedoodle puppy is not a chewer but when we boarded him for five days he must have been bored and chewed a hole in the outer wall of his bed letting out the stuffing. Disappointing as we only recently purchased in. The cover is definitely not durable. Bed feels harder than what I imagined which does make it sturdy. Other than the quality that the bed lacks it looks great and my dog did enjoy it for the short time it lasted. The stuffing on the outer walls are made up of bits of foam, which is what you remove to wash the cover. The middle core part stays in tack.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable with head rest all around!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this VIP (Very important Pet) bed My puppy says, “I need a sleep mask to nap during the day!”
customer_reviews.author: ashok

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bed was to small for my dog. It was not filled much either.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this bed. My German Shepherd is very picky about beds but she is always in this one. The sides are nice for them to lay their head on. It’s the perfect size for my 60lbs dog, and it looks nice too
customer_reviews.author: K Fish

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it! 24lb dog fits great.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. 24lb dog fits great. I don't know why he loves it more than other beds. Maybe because its not flat and its more comfortable. I don't know what the blue gravel picture is from manufacturer? Also the dog in their pic is way to big.
customer_reviews.author: Nradv

customer_reviews.title: Best pet bed for my pug who has orthopedic and ...
customer_reviews.text: Best pet bed for my pug who has orthopedic and spinal issues. Crawls right in and he looks soooo comfy! Perfect. I have a few of these around the house.
customer_reviews.author: SmartConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and design, we couldn't be happier !
customer_reviews.text: The absolute BEST ! Both my dogs love this bed. I now have two of this same bed, just a different size/color. Amazing quality and design. We couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Would order again!
customer_reviews.text: My older dog absolutely loves this bed. She has a neck issue and it helps keep her head supported. If a mattress is too soft she has a hard time walking over it but this one is the perfect amount of support and comfort without being so soft she trips on it. Great dog bed!!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie berard

customer_reviews.title: So wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Bought for my cats esp. my one boy is 32 lbs (Maine Coons) he says it's the cats Meow! Soft supporting and just oh so wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Great pet bed!
customer_reviews.text: My pup LOVES these beds. She tends to run warm all the time and a lot of beds would get too hot for her and she would sleep in the floor instead. Now she sleeps in these all night. We have them all over the house for her!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Howland

customer_reviews.title: Plush
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed. Very plush with nice bolster. Maddening how cheap the zipper on the cover is.
customer_reviews.author: mtownmom

customer_reviews.title: Great pet bed
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and design of this product. Fits into decor nicely. My dog loves the gel bed.
customer_reviews.author: JA Lowcountry

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE this bed! I have two dogs (one 40lb and one 14lb) and they both pile on top of each other to share this bed. Not only is it adorable, it is comfortable for them. I have washed it once, it seems to have held up well, the zipper is easy to find in the crease. I love the shape but I find that I am fluffing it to help it retain it’s shape over time.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Dog's love it
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but flexible super soft and pups love it from big to small they all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Doggy mommy

customer_reviews.title: 10 year old dog loves this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20 pound dog and he is in love with this new bed I got. I love the color and the fabric and it's super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak zipper
customer_reviews.text: The zipper is not sturdy and separates. I had the bed for a year and the zipper eventually broke beyond repair. I bought the same bed again and when my dog “paws” the bed to get ready to lie down, the zipper separated. I pieced it back together for now.
customer_reviews.author: JB Eighton

customer_reviews.title: Great bed you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: This bed is exactly what I was looking for. My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Hume

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy dog bed. Great for those dogs who like to some support on the outer edge.
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for my 80lb girl. When I unpacked it, Ginger went right over and laid down in it before I had a chance to move it into the family room. The bed holds its shape well and hasn't flattened out.
customer_reviews.author: Oz Gal

customer_reviews.title: such a really nice bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought both sizes and keeping them both because sometimes my dog likes to curl up and sometimes wants to stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loves her bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I have purchased for my granddog. The first one lasted a good two years with daily use. She loves it! Don't even try to sneak a thin, uncomfortable bed in - she knows the difference!
customer_reviews.author: rach5784

customer_reviews.title: Stan likes it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice looking bed and my man Stan doesn’t hate it! ‘Nuff said 😂
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My dove love it
customer_reviews.text: It's very manage and the best part is that you can remove the cover to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: cinthya bosquez

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: The bed is comfortable and my cat sleeps blissfully in it. It big enough for a mid-sized cat.
customer_reviews.author: J. Michailova

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam Dog bed Best company.
customer_reviews.text: Love your product ,My Dog is so Happy this is her 2nd bed she is so comfortable in it. 100% satisfied will recommend and purchase again..👍👍
customer_reviews.author: walter c funk

customer_reviews.title: It's more like an x-small for a tiny dog under 10lbs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the small. Had to return it because of its size. It's more like an x-small for a tiny dog under 10lbs. Ordered the medium for my small Pekingese. Spacious but not deep. Was trying to look for a trustypup memory foam bed, no success so this was the closest. She tends to switch from the wood floor to her bed to her large Pet Fusion bed to the floor. Her friend has one that she absolutely loves. The Petlinks texture is very soft, not that much cushion. You can easily feel the floor when you step on it. She doesn't mind rolling around in it, but it's just not that special bed. Haven't found it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jhane

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: We had this for one week and the Zipper opened and won’t close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 4lb pomenarian loves this bed easy to wash a
customer_reviews.author: momshopper

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat Bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for our cats. Both enjoy them! Sleep nightly in comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Vittoria

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maintain. All stuffing easily removed to wash.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed for my dogs! Thay love it too. It's great that you are able to remove all stuffing and wash the outer layer.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Zipper pulls apart too easily
customer_reviews.text: My 6-month-old lab pulled apart the zipper within 5 min of laying this down for him. The rest of the bed seems good quality but the zipper is cheap. He does chew but this is just unacceptable. If your dog is bigger than 20 lbs and will pull AT ALL on the bed, then their cheap zipper will pull apart and this bed becomes useless. This is a real bummer because I wanted it to work. Now I'm out looking for another dog bed :(
customer_reviews.author: rmoak

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the petlinks soothing escape bed, size medium, and was very disappointed with what I received. The bed is very shallow and though the bottom seemed like the shredded gel memory foam, the sides were very flimsy stuffing that weren't even durable enough for my 20lb dog to rest his head on. DEFINITELY NOT worth the $70 I paid for this bed. Already sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, not easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: Well built, wide and comfortable for my 50lb Aussie. The edges could be a little higher to provide more Comfort and support. It is not easy to wash - has to comes apart, unless you have a pretty large washer.
customer_reviews.author: tptha

product_meta.title: Petlinks Soothing Gel Memory Foam Pet Beds
product_meta.description: Style:Supreme Soother| Size:LargeThe Petlinks Supreme Soother premium bolster pet bed with gel memory foam cushion provides cooling comfort and conforms to your pet's body contours. Gel beads cool and comfort while memory foam relieves achy joints. The color of the plush cover is natural with gray corduroy sides. The cover is also removable and machine washable. Available in medium and large sizes. Eco advantage: Our reclaimed memory foam mix is made of shredded leftover remnants from foam manufacturing, keeping waste out of landfills. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. Petlinks therapeutic pet beds help relieve join pain and ease tired muscles by evenly distributing your dog's weight to help rejuvenate him while he rests. Convoluted foam's distinctive bumps both cushion and support, while memory and gel foams conform to your dog's unique shape, alleviating stress on aching pressure points. Safe for pets! Petlinks products meet or exceed all applicable safety standards.
